abstract: Citigroup raised 270 billion yen ($2.2 billion) in Japan’s biggest bond sale by a foreign firm, tapping demand for higher returns than investors can receive from the nation’s companies.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup raised 270 billion yen ($2.2 billion) in Japan’s biggest bond sale by a foreign firm, tapping demand for higher returns than investors can receive from the nation’s companies.

headline.main: Citi Raises $2.2 Billion in Landmark Japanese Bond Sale
